捄字的基本解释

捄
jiù
同“救”。

捄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jū］
［《廣韻》舉朱切，平虞，見。］
盛土于器。
[②]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
(1)长而曲貌。
(2)通“莍”。果实的房。
(3)指果实。
[③]［jiù］
［《集韻》居又切，去宥，見。］
(1)同“救”。救援。
(2)指挽救。
(3)止；纠正。

捄字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捄； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页433第03
【唐韻】舉朱切【集韻】【韻會】恭于切，?音駒。【說文】盛土於梩中也。一曰捊也。【詩·大雅】捄之陾陾。【箋】築牆者，捊聚壤土，盛之以虆，而投諸版中。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?居尤切，音鳩。義同。　又【唐韻】巨鳩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】渠尤切，?音求。長貌。【詩·小雅】有捄棘?。又【周頌】有捄其角。【箋】角貌。　又【集韻】【韻會】?渠幽切，音虯。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?居又切。同救。止也，護也。【前漢·董仲舒傳】將以捄溢扶衰。【註】捄，古救字。註詳攴部七畫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jū］
["Guang Yun" Zhu Qi, Ping Yu, see. ]
Containing soil in a vessel.
[②]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
(1) Long and curved appearance.
(2) Through "Xun". Fruit room.
(3) Refers to the fruit.
[③]［jiù］
["Ji Yun" Ju and cut, go to You, see. ]
(1) Same as "rescue". Rescue.
(2) Refers to rescue.
(3) Stop; correct.

[Tang Yun] Ju Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Respectful to Qi,? Yin Ju. 【Said the text】The land is also rich in the temple. One said, 捊also. 【Poetry·Daya】The stunner. 【Jian】The wall-builder gathers the loam, and uses it to prosper, and casts it into various editions.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Ju Youqie, sound dove. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Giant Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Qu Youqie,? Yinqiu. Long-looking. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Is there a thorn in it? Also 【Zhou Song】has been stunned. 【Note】Angle appearance.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The channel is quiet and sound. The same meaning.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Home and cut. Save the same.
